amendment.description: To require a GAO study on the programs authorized by the bill.

vote.text: Amendment SA 294 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 294 proposed by Senator Cornyn for Senator Flake. (consideration: CR S2333-2337; text: CR S2334) To require a GAO study on the programs authorized by the bill.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 294 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 294 proposed by Senator Cornyn for Senator Flake.
